title: Did not get first strike loading screen boarders
body:
On the 1/08/2016, I purchased First Strike Augment + Bundle (which cost over 8000 rp), but I have not received my Project Champion Caches.

I have all the icons, but no blueprints to create the first strike borders. I didn't get any champion caches. 

Any idea on what to do? Riot support has been very unhelpful, saying that I own the icons, when I am after the loading screen borders.

Thanks guys!

replies.body:
Hey man,

Sorry someone couldn't get onto this earlier for you. You should continue to work with **Riot** support, but I'll try to give you a hand as well.

**First, a few really basic questions so I can make sure you're doing stuff right:**

1. _Have you already checked in-game to see if you automatically got the First Strike border?_
 
 I've got a feeling this is your issue. If you get a blueprint normally, you receive the icon WITH the First Strike border. **Riot** is saying you got the icon automatically, therefore you probably got the border automatically too. 

 Make sure you know exactly what the [border](https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dP7EiMmUENk/V479NJtcTcI/AAAAAAAA83Y/FXa5EPiMBnURmrw3O05CkVpNn07qTCDowCLcB/s640/%255E7CCEC7FBBD1DF01D108A9D6370F477521ED80B42D0F3294C4E%255Epimgpsh_fullsize_distr.jpg) looks like so you can accurately tell me if you have it.

2. _You're checking for your project caches in the Hextech Crafting tab, right?_

If this was a mistake from **Riot**'s end, then there's a good chance that they'll give you the First Strike border even after the event has ended. 

Don't panic please!
Nobody else having this issue? I would like to get it resolved soon as the event is ending pls help
